greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows generated from A007249, the convolution square root of A007191
formula: Triangle read by rows, self-convolution of A007249. Begin with M = an infinite lower triangular Toeplitz matrix with A007249 as every column. Let Q = a matrix with A007249: (1, -12, 66, -232,..) as the right border and the rest zeros. Triangle A161196 = M * Q.
example: First few rows of the triangle =
results.author: Gary W. Adamson & _Alexander R. Povolotsky_, Jun 06 2009
